name: TechnologyBuzzwordGenerator
0:
”Alexa, ask Tech Buzz to tell me something smart”
”Alexa, ask Tech Buzz what is a smart thing to say”
”Alexa, ask Tech Buzz to say something smart”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tech buzz
des: This skill will generate a technology statement using a large collection of buzzwords. You can ask it to repeat it's last statement, or have it generate a new one. Just say, "Alexa ask Tech Buzz to tell me something smart" and it'll give you a very intelligent sounding response. Then you can either say 'Yes' to generate another, 'Repeat' to hear it again, or 'No' to end the conversation.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
